scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis performs her original song 'Temari' on a grand, cosmic-themed 3D stage with moving clockwork elements.
A post-live announcement section featuring merch re-releases and the reveal of original LINE stamps.

subtitles.original: ゆらゆら
subtitles.english: Swaying...

subtitles.original: 混じった呪いと祝福が
subtitles.english: The mixed curse and blessing...

subtitles.original: 目の前を
subtitles.english: ...before my eyes...

subtitles.original: 知ってるの？
subtitles.english: Do you know?

subtitles.original: 始まりと終わりに 向かって
subtitles.english: Towards the beginning and the end...

subtitles.original: 果てに、帰ってくるのは
subtitles.english: ...what comes back in the end is...

subtitles.original: パパの呼び声だけ
subtitles.english: ...only Papa's calling voice.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、パパ、
subtitles.english: Ah, Papa...

subtitles.original: そこに居たら教えて欲しいの
subtitles.english: If you are there, I want you to tell me...

subtitles.original: 私が歩くこの道は
subtitles.english: ...this path that I walk...

subtitles.original: どんな色だろう
subtitles.english: ...what color will it be?

subtitles.original: さあ、この調べの旋律を
subtitles.english: Now, this melody of investigation...

subtitles.original: 空に手を伸ばし始める
subtitles.english: ...start reaching out to the sky...

subtitles.original: 散らばった 遠くの地のいろ
subtitles.english: The scattered colors of distant lands...

subtitles.original: 愛を渇望して 泣き叫んでる
subtitles.english: ...crying out, thirsting for love.

subtitles.original: 始まりと終わりに 向かって
subtitles.english: Towards the beginning and the end...

subtitles.original: 果てに、帰ってくるのは
subtitles.english: ...what comes back in the end is...

subtitles.original: 救われなかった君の声
subtitles.english: ...your voice that was not saved.

subtitles.original: 愛しい妹よ
subtitles.english: My beloved sister...

subtitles.original: そこに居たら教えて
subtitles.english: If you are there, tell me...

subtitles.original: 君の手をいつかまた
subtitles.english: Will I be able to hold your hand...

subtitles.original: 握れるのかな
subtitles.english: ...again someday?

subtitles.original: Hello everyone! I hope you guys enjoyed the live.
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! I hope you guys enjoyed the live.

subtitles.original: And now that the live is over, I got some announcements for you guys. Wow!
subtitles.english: And now that the live is over, I got some announcements for you guys. Wow!

subtitles.original: Well first of all, it is the merch announcement. Woo!
subtitles.english: Well first of all, it is the merch announcement. Woo!

subtitles.original: This time around, I'm gonna be doing a Re-Released Edition Fashion Special. Wow!
subtitles.english: This time around, I'm gonna be doing a Re-Released Edition Fashion Special. Wow!

subtitles.original: You see some familiar and most requested items you guys kind of told me about.
subtitles.english: You see some familiar and most requested items you guys kind of told me about.

subtitles.original: So we're going to be releasing the TAKOD.EX Hoodie Re-Released Edition...
subtitles.english: So we're going to be releasing the TAKOD.EX Hoodie Re-Released Edition...

subtitles.original: ...and "Not-A-Bad-End" T-Shirt Re-Released Edition, a matching T-shirt with Ina!
subtitles.english: ...and "Not-A-Bad-End" T-Shirt Re-Released Edition, a matching T-shirt with Ina!

subtitles.original: And of course, when you have clothes, you gotta have a nice way to wash those clothes...
subtitles.english: And of course, when you have clothes, you gotta have a nice way to wash those clothes...

subtitles.original: ...so I'm also gonna be releasing "They-said-I-could-become-anything" Tako Mesh Laundry Pouch Re-Released Edition. Wow!
subtitles.english: ...so I'm also gonna be releasing "They-said-I-could-become-anything" Tako Mesh Laundry Pouch Re-Released Edition. Wow!

subtitles.original: So all of these items are re-released, which means that they're gonna have a different tag...
subtitles.english: So all of these items are re-released, which means that they're gonna have a different tag...

subtitles.original: ...from their original, you know, released versions.
subtitles.english: ...from their original, you know, released versions.

subtitles.original: And these items are just a reproduction of the premium talent merch released in the past...
subtitles.english: And these items are just a reproduction of the premium talent merch released in the past...

subtitles.original: ...and will have the special 2024 re-released edition label as the proof.
subtitles.english: ...and will have the special 2024 re-released edition label as the proof.

subtitles.original: And up next, we got LINE stamps!
subtitles.english: And up next, we got LINE stamps!

subtitles.original: This is an official stamp pack that's gonna be released right after this live, wow, this stream, yes. Soon, very soon.
subtitles.english: This is an official stamp pack that's gonna be released right after this live, wow, this stream, yes. Soon, very soon.

subtitles.original: And it's drawn by none other than yours truly, Ninomae Ina'nis.
subtitles.english: And it's drawn by none other than yours truly, Ninomae Ina'nis.

subtitles.original: Honestly, I've always wanted like an easy to use stamp pack and I use LINE a lot...
subtitles.english: Honestly, I've always wanted like an easy to use stamp pack and I use LINE a lot...

subtitles.original: ...so I thought, you know, I'll take this chance to draw a whole set myself.
subtitles.english: ...so I thought, you know, I'll take this chance to draw a whole set myself.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys like it and I guess if you use LINE a bit, I hope you guys check it out.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys like it and I guess if you use LINE a bit, I hope you guys check it out.

subtitles.original: I think they turned out pretty good, so...
subtitles.english: I think they turned out pretty good, so...

subtitles.original: The link will be in the description below, up, above, below, below, yes, somewhere in the description, so make sure to check it out!
subtitles.english: The link will be in the description below, up, above, below, below, yes, somewhere in the description, so make sure to check it out!
